name: Tic Tac Toe (itch) (Ali1397)
description:
Tic Tac Toe is a light and simple puzzle game suitable for players of any age. This game supports offline mode, players can play against intelligent AI, or play with family, friends or strangers in two-player mode.
Our Tic Tac Toe game offers:
1. Support two players mode, you can experience the fun of the game with family, friends and even strangers.
2. The opening of the level-breaking mode, the combination of step-by-step difficulty and various board sizes, allows players to improve their logical thinking and reasoning ability while enjoying tic-tac-toe.
3. With the addition of special mode, players can experience the classic mode and increase the fun of the game.
4. The ability to undo actions and useful hints.
5. Achievement system
6. Offline games
Playing a game of tic-tac-toe is a great way to spend your free time. Stop wasting paper, let's protect trees together! Start playing free tic-tac-toe games on your PC!
Download Tic Tac Toe now and start your happy journey!
